message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with spatio-temporal action localization in videos, which involves computer vision and machine learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a novel approach that involves tracking and scoring using CNN features, which suggests that it could belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) as well. Additionally, the paper uses a spatio-temporal motion histogram and a sliding-window approach, which could fall under cs.MM (Multimedia) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) respectively. Finally, the paper involves object detection and classification, which could also place it under cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
